text: John Bradford (fl. 1377–1391), of Leominster, Herefordshire, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Leominster in January 1377, January 1380, 1385 and 1391. ==References== Category:14th- century births Category:Year of death missing Category:English MPs January 1377 Category:English MPs January 1380 Category:English MPs 1385 Category:English MPs 1391 Category:14th-century English politicians Category:People from Herefordshire
title: John Bradford (MP)
